Articles.Content: I been playing for a couple of weeks now... I love this game, but it has a steep learning curve. I've managed to make it to the Mun and back and am now trying to get a space station up and running... having major dramas getting it off the ground. But I'll get there. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Hey there, one. Welcome to the forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hopefully it will be the greatest station of all time... One that distributes bossness.

Hopefully it won't distribute bosses, video game or work.

Welcome!
Check out the in game docking tutorial and ask some stuff from xannari fellows cuz he was a great help to me.
